articles.description: Euro 2024 live: Reaction to Scotland 1-1 Switzerland and build-up to England v Denmark
articles.title: Euro 2024 live: Reaction to Scotland 1-1 Switzerland & build-up to England v Denmark

articles.description: Serbia threaten to pull out of Euro 2024 over chanting between fans at the Croatia and Albania match on Wednesday.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Serbia threaten to quit over chants by Croatia and Albania fans

articles.description: Chief football writer Phil McNulty looks at how Gareth Southgate can get Phil Foden's brilliance at club level to translate into England's Euro 2024 campaign.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Should England start Phil Foden against Denmark?

articles.description: England laid down a "marker" in their T20 World Cup defence with a near-perfect performance against West Indies, says Steven Finn.
articles.title: T20 World Cup: England 'almost perfect' in win over West Indies, says Steven Finn

articles.description: Tottenham forward Son Heung-min says team-mate Rodrigo Bentancur has apologised to him for using a racial slur and the pair are "past this" and "united".
articles.title: Bentancur has apologised to me for racial slur - Son

articles.description: Premier League newcomers Leicester City appoint former Nottingham Forest boss Steve Cooper as their new manager.
articles.title: Steve Cooper: Leicester City appoint former Nottingham Forest boss

articles.description: Scotland show their best qualities - as well as their worst - to get their Euro 2024 campaign back on track, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland find themselves in draw with Switzerland

articles.description: Manchester United co-owner Sir Jim Ratcliffe opposes to the introduction of a football regulator.
articles.title: Sir Jim Ratcliffe: Man Utd co-owner says football regulator 'won't be good'

articles.description: Brentford boss Thomas Frank tells Alex Scott his native Denmark face a 'tricky tie' against England - and that he's backing Gareth's Southgates men to win Euro 2024.
articles.title: England v Denmark: Thomas Frank on Euro 2024 group stage tie

articles.title: Denmark vs England: UEFA Euro 2024 - BBC Sport
